sense.def:
A flood
je velika količina vode, ki prekrije neko navadno suho območje, na primer takrat, ko reka prestopi bregove.

seg.quote: In 1975, floods in north-eastern India made 233,000 people homeless.

sense.def:
Kadar neki kraj
floods
, postane prekrit z vodo.

seg.quote: When we took the plug out the kitchen flooded.
There has been heavy rain in many areas, resulting in widespread flooding.

sense.def:
Kadar reka
floods
, prestopi bregove, največkrat po zelo obilnem deževju.

A flood of things
je veliko število stvari.

seg.quote: She received a flood of grateful letters.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje ali stvari
flood into a place
, v velikem številu pridejo na neki kraj.

seg.quote: This brought more and more migrants flooding into the cities.
